casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Noui PHACHOUMPHONE 65PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2018 William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, for Phachoumphone, Noui. M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of October 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of October 2018."

*694Defendant shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
